nodes.text: Roark Slader was a male Human who was once a commander in the Entrallan Militia before he left to become a smuggler and pirate, plying his 'trade' some time during the early years of the New Republic. During this time he commanded both the Vee-Kir 4 Bulk Transport Slader's Raider I and the Corellian gunship Slader's Raider II.
